entity.name: HeatbeatCounter
entity.doc: Create a sequence of tokens with increasing value

property.name: setActions
property.value: powerLevel = powerLevel - ((processor_isPresent ? processor : 0) + (sensor_isPresent ? sensor : 0) + (comm_isPresent ? comm : 0) + (motion_isPresent ? motion : 0))

entity.name: Ramp
entity.doc: Create a sequence of tokens with increasing value

property.name: text
property.value: Weibull reliability functionality to provide a probability of failure over time.
